title: New Course Added: Advanced React Development
description: Learn advanced React concepts including hooks, context, and performance optimization in our comprehensive new course.

content.data:
We're excited to announce our newest course: Advanced React Development!

This comprehensive course covers:

• Advanced React Hooks and Custom Hooks
• Context API and State Management
• Performance Optimization Techniques
• Testing with Jest and React Testing Library
• Advanced Patterns and Best Practices
• Real-world Project Implementation

Course Details:
• Duration: 8 weeks
• Difficulty: Advanced
• Prerequisites: Basic React knowledge
• Certificate: Yes, upon completion

Enroll now and take your React skills to the next level!
